name: Swarm Of Rats
flavor: A skittering mass of ordinary rodents moving as one like a ravenous wave.

features.name: Horde (1d4+1) - Passive
features.desc: When the Swarm has marked half or more of their HP, their standard attack deals 1d4+1 physical damage instead.

features.name: In Your Face - Passive
features.desc: All targets within Melee range have disadvantage on attacks against targets other than the Swarm.
